header.rec_loc: walking through sand dunes in California on holiday
header.topics: The happiness project; moving house to a different area/country; importance of happiness over money.
header.activity: Walking through sand dunes talking about life

speaker.fls: Italian -- level unspecified; French -- level unspecified
